News
• I am looking for graduate students pursing M.S. and Ph.D. degree. Please contact me if you are interested in physical design and design automation

Research Topics
CAD solutions for physical design challenges on 3D ICs

Artificial intelligence

Design and technology co-optimization

Physical/logical design and analysis

College of Information and Communication Engineering  Learn more >

SEG-CAD & CSG
Apple Inc., Austin, TX  Learn more >
- CAD solutions for electromigration and power rail analysis
- Vectorless dynamic rail analysis methodology improvement/development
- Building CAD infrastructure for rail analysis
- Tool enhancement and enablement for advanced technology nodes

Georgia Tech Computer Aided Design Laboratory  Learn more >
Georgia Institute of Technology, Atlanta, GA  Learn more >
Advisor: Dr. Sung Kyu Lim  Learn more >
- Design and tool solutions for low-power and reliable 3D ICs
- Design methodologies for deep neural network 3D ICs
- Physical design flow development for 3D ICs
- Analysis and physical design solutions for low-power 3D ICs in advanced technology nodes
- Analysis and optimization methodologies of power delivery network of 3D ICs
- Temperature-aware timing analysis and optimization for 3D ICs
• May. 2015 - Apr. 2016:     R&D Intern
Research Group
ARM Inc., Austin, TX  Learn more >
- Analysis and design solutions for M3D (monolithic 3D) ICs on ARM cores
- Analysis on power benefits of M3D ICs on ARM cores
- Physical design solutions to improve power-supply integrity of M3D ICs
- Physical design flow development for M3D ICs
• Jan. 2010 - Aug. 2013:    Associate Research Engineer
SoC Design Lab., AP Team
MtekVision, Seongnam, South Korea  Learn more >
- Application processor (AP) logic design
- High speed serial interface development between AP and modem
- Long MP3 playtime audio system development using Tensilica DSP

• Aug. 2007 - Dec. 2009:    Graduate Research Assistant
Design Automation Laboratory
Seoul National University, Seoul, South Korea  Learn more >
Advisor: Dr. Kiyoung Choi  Learn more >
- Hardware and software architecture of coarse-grained reconfigurable architecture (CGRA)

• CAD solutions for physical design challenges on 3D ICs
